text: The man that came out was very nice very polite our refrigerator was under warranty and he fixed it right away put the pardon I’ve done business with them before never had a problem keep up the good work

name: Heather Scott
text: whirlpool says they are the only certified repair tech close. But they have been out to my house 12+ times over 2 years and not one thing has actually been fixed.   Parts have been replaced but within a few days there is a new issue. Its been 4 different  appliances. The fridge I have now just needed the ice maker fixed cause it wasn't working the day I got it. Now the fridge won't even cool enough to keep food in it. I just want the things either fixed or for whirlpool to be told they can't be so they will replace it before another warranty runs out and im out alot of money.

resp.text: I’m sorry to hear about the issues you’ve been having. What name might that be under so I can look into it? I don’t have any records under the name Heather Scott.

name: Willa Burton
text: Had to call 2 days in a row.. never showed up after being told they would be here on Thursday. Took off work. Called that evening at 3:30 when no one had came yet or called. No answer. Left a message. It’s 10:45pm and still haven’t gotten a call back.. all I would have needed is a phone call to tell me they were busy and needed to reschedule.. I do not recommend them. Their time is no better than mine.

name: MinerNat108 MinecraftGameGirl108
text: Great people 👏👍

name: Steven Brown
text: They are usually busy, not having many appliance repairmen in the area, so expect a wait. Found my Problem and made temporary repairs within an hour of arriving. Teflon door spacer/riser that keeps door seated in place against the gasket for refrigerator had deteriorated/broken where it looked closed but lost seal and allowed unit to ICE UP. Parts ordered. Very happy with Visit and Repair Cost!!!!

name: DeeAnn Caporale
text: This place is so unprofessional!! Can’t give you a time when they are coming so they say morning. Well morning comes and goes and afternoon I call.... same story oh someone will be there! Total lie! Don’t answer phones don’t show up don’t make appointments for scheduling. Going on for days now! This is the worst place to do business with! Don’t do it!

name: Sharon Guthrie
text: After waiting a couple of days Came out after hours fix my dryer very professional  will use again

resp.text: Hi, I am so sorry for the delay. We have had an influx of service calls lately and unfortunately it’s taking us longer to work through them now because of the extra precautions we are taking due to the virus.

name: Shanquille Finch
text: Needed a refrigerator so found this place on line. When my daughter and I walked in the man was on the phone didn’t give us a hand sign or anything, got up and walked out of the room to the back room. If I could have given no stars I would have. Very, very rude and apparently didn’t need my money. I did look however for a second, priced are SKY HIGH! DO NOT recommend this place to anyone!

resp.text:
I would like to apologize for your experience. That is certainly not typical. We are a local family business and always strive to treat everyone as we would want to be treated. As for the prices, I’ve double checked all the prices we have on refrigerator s and most of them are fairly competitive for the particular models. There was one model that was mis-priced and has been adjusted accordingly and we thank you for bringing that to our attention. Again I’m sorry for what happened in your case and hope you will give us another chance in the future.
Thanks, Josh

name: George Alford
text: Always willing to help with advice.

name: Daniella Barone
text:
Terrible experience using this “company” Everything they advertise on their website was false. I needed a repair on a GE dishwasher that they claimed was their most common brand they worked on and that the stocked their vans with parts and have same day service. None of that was true. I researched several places and decided on them based on those things.

The technician, Casey was late for the appointment, which was not that big of a deal but when he got there he hardly checked anything just pressed the buttons and looked under the appliance.....which by watching YouTube I had already done more to diagnose than he did. When he tried to explain what was wrong with it he really couldn’t because he said he didnt have the tools to diagnose the problem....? I thought that was what he was there to do? Anyway came time to pay and it was a 70 dollar service fee which I would have been fine with but he literally didn’t do anything!! He wanted to fix the problem by trial and error (because he didn’t have what was necessary to diagnose or fix it)..by buying two parts and seeing if they would fix it and by that point I could just buy a new dishwasher.

I tried to call and tell my experience with a manager and they blew me off and never called back. I told them I’d be disputing the charge because service was not rendered at all. Such terrible customer service.

If you are looking for a repair on an appliance with people who know what they are doing and good customer service....look elsewhere and don’t rely on the info from their website.

name: Roshani ji
text: Our LG dishwasher would not turn on so I called Tuscaloosa Appliance Repair. The repairman was able to be at our house later the same afternoon. He repaired it immediately!

name: Jeffrey Kniffin
text: Are they still in business? Called the number for an appointment and recording states that the number is no longer in service.

name: Alex Shopper
text: Cost was affordable and service was professional. Would recommend if you are looking for appliance repair in Tuscaloosa.

name: Madison Miller
text: Yay! Our stove is working again. Thank you, Tuscaloosa Appliance Repair!

name: Steve Jones
text: We called for someone to install a new heating element in our dryer. A technician came out immediately, our dryer was repaired 30 minutes later. I highly recommend this service.

resp.text: Hi Steve - Thank you for the review! So glad we had the part on-hand to repair the dryer right away. We appreciate your business!

name: Anabel Cox
text: We called for someone to come out and look at the thermostat in our refrigerator. Tuscaloosa Appliance Repair sent a technician over less than two hours later. The technician, Allen, replaced the thermostat and cleaned the coils behind the refrigerator for free. Very happy with the service and the cost was affordable too!

resp.text: Hi Anabel - Sounds like the service was a success! Thank you for sharing your experience with Tuscaloosa Appliance Repair!

name: William Sanchez
text: Nice repairmen and professional service! They've repaired both my refrigerator and oven this past year. I would recommend Tuscaloosa Appliance Repair.

resp.text: Hi William - We pride ourselves in our professional service. It's great to hear your appointments this year have gone so well. Thank you!

name: Nilofar Samina

text: Bought  new refrigerator from sears 4yrs ago. Have had to call for 2 years out and it quit again 2 weeks ago. Still waiting for them to come fix it. Clearly customers are not important to sears anymore. No wonder they are going belly up. They have forgotten who actualy pays thier bills. Not the shareholders....the customer. text: The service was not what l expected it to be because l was charged $179.00 for dryer not being fixed .it was the worse service call l have ever had from you all.

name: marie fischtziur
text: Jolette Fischtziur.  I just had repair for  a small part from my water hose to the connection  for the ice maker in my fridge. It to the repair person about 20 minutes  to  connect it. It cost $489.+  . This is awful. The repair person was kind,polite and professional, but if there is another company available  I will use them. Due to this  lock down I could not find  another company available.  The cost was to high. I tried to speak to someone at the repair center and the women was unwilling to listen to me and hung up. I was not rude.

name: Jennifer Killam
text: They never showed up but said they did, cameras don't lie...but will take your money

name: Ursula Lowe
text: This has nothing to do with the repair man. He was polite and very professional. However, I was appalled having to pay $131.50 for a service that did not require a part. Over the years I have spent so much money on appliances with Sears because I believed in Sears. I am giving it up, I will only buy cheap foreign things at least I don't feel taking advantage when the darn thing brakes down. I'll just get another one. This is were you could have increased business by showing you trust your products and if repairs are required after warranty the costs are reasonable. A $131.50 without parts, in my opinion, is unreasonable. Good luck for the future, without me!

name: Hugh B
text:
Horrible!!!  The first technician showed-up to repair my GAS range with no manometer (device to measure gas pressure), then tried to guess at the problem being related to the electronic ignition system.  Then, the second technician shows-up a week later with the manometer but with no adapters to check the gas line or the regulator pressure so just guesses it's probably the regulator.  But, the regulator he orders and delivered to my house is clearly the wrong part so I have to spend hours with their non-native English speaking customer service representatives to cancel the next service call and get a UPS pickup order to return the part.

Now SEARS is fighting my credit card dispute for all the charges including the wrong part that was returned over a week ago.   No wonder the company is having so much financial difficulty.

I WILL NEVER USE SEARS EVER AGAIN!

name: Mandy Hawsey
text: Was timely and prompt with service, but I will not use them again. Way overpriced for a simple repair. Felt completely ripped off.

name: T Herman
text: I had two services scheduled, Dishwasher and Washer and Dryer.  The first cancelled a week early and was rescheduled (dishwasher). The second after waiting 4 hours, as a no show called on the 5th hour to say they were running late and could they still come (washer & dryer), needless to say the answer was no.   The service provided for the dishwasher was great but the cancels and no shows are unacceptable.  Im not sure if the washer & dryer have been rescheduled, my wife is handling it.

text: Our fridge started getting hot last week and I did some research and thought I knew what it was but I didn’t have time to mess with it, my wife called him while I was working he made it out that day and unthawed it and it was working great, however I got home and the freezer wouldn’t open I’m in the service industry myself and have seen plenty bad guys so I thought he had it jammed, I called him after the weekend ended and he told me the track was frozen from our faulty ice machine letting out moisture, I needed to unplug it and thaw it and then it would open and I should grease it, I did what he said and it worked now everythings perfect. Saved us 2 thousand dollars for a new one. He was responsive and even drove by today to make sure we got it opened.

name: Beverly McCutcheon
text:
TRAVIS, I got the best finally. Gave up, looked for Gutter Repair. 8 years of misery with Gutter Company that installed never could fix. Same areas. Travis has been here several times repairs and so much more. More then I can say this man has done.Truly needed him years ago. Stopped all the problems I have had for 8 years with leaking gutters, A nightmare for me. I feel rescued. Has been so great I could never say enough about him. A really nice man too I got know well as I was out there with him showing me what was wrong and needed. So where would I be now without Travis. Another person or new gutters? First day he came I was horrified what he found. Asked him do I just need new gutters again, was worried then about the whole house. He said no, he was repairing them, I needed to see what was wrong, those areas. Travis saved me a lot money and stress I have been through with the thought of new gutters and couldn’t be repaired. I will always use him.
I see now here too maybe he can clean them. Had no
Idea all the other things this company can do. Will be helpful for me too. All the great reviews and I have just gotten one of them, Travis. Must be just like him.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review! We are very pleased that you were happy with Travis and will pass that along to him!!

name: Devon Rankin
text: Hired BFP to install screens for my existing back porch. Blake contacted me the day after I submitted my request to talk through it. We communicated via text and phone after as questions came up and then Blake put together a detailed scope for the work and made great suggestions for materials to use for the job. We ran into problems sourcing the materials (very high demand!), but he kept me informed of the delay along the way and was able to begin work as soon as we had what we needed. Work was performed over a 3 day period, and Blake showed up on time and worked diligently each day. He kept me updated on his progress during the day and the end product turned out great. We can't wait to start using our newly screened porch.

resp.text: Thank you so much Devon!  We are so pleased that everything went well and will happily share your kind works with Blake!

name: Lawrence Sheffield
text: BFR is the best in the business! I wish I called them sooner. Thanks Seth and Gibbs.

text: Can't say enough good things about this service! They showed up, on time, the day after initial call. Tim assembled our patio furniture in just over two hours. We are so pleased. We'll never use anyone else. Thanks, guys!

name: Bryan Ramsey
text: About a month ago I had posted a negative review about Birmingham Fast Repair, and I'm here to say that I was WRONG!!! They were quick to respond in the most professional manner to my complaint. Seth made this matter his top concern, which every customer would want. This just goes to show the quality of customer service this group has. Seth was very apologetic (which he did not need to be) and did a fantastic job on installing my french patio doors. Seth was such a pleasure to be around. Not only was he professional, but he took time to get to know me and my family, which went beyond my expectations. His work and craftsmanship were very impressive. He definitely knows his work and set the bar very high. I could write this review all day on how pleased we were to have him in our home and his work product. I feel like I have finally found a company that I can trust to do an Honest, and PROFESSIONAL job at an unbeatable price. Seth's work has transformed our home beyond what we thought it could look like. I would highly recommend SETH and Birmingham Fast Repair for all of your projects. They will definitely be my "go-to" company for future projects.

resp.text: Thank you so much Bryan!  We really value our customers and appreciate that you took time to write this review for us.  We are so pleased that you were happy with the work Seth did for you and very grateful that you gave us a second chance! Please call us again any time!

text: Gibbs, from bham fast repair, repaired a fence that was damaged from Zeta. I couldn’t get any companies to call back because everyone was busy because of the storm. Very efficient way to handle work especially since I couldn’t even get a return call from others. We worked out the details and it was repaired within a  week or so. He saved us money on supplies and followed through on everything he said he would do. He was even early to my house to start the repairs. No surprise charges either. Very impressive individual and company. If I ever need any other odd jobs done, I’ll definitely reach out to Gibbs and Birmingham Fast Repair

name: Sheena W
text: It was a pleasure working with Chris. I live out of state and own a 4 plex. One of the units were vacant and needed some paint/drywall work before being put back on the market. Chris was quick in contacting me, quick to start and complete the job and great at maintaining constant communication throughout the project. He was very willing to go above and beyond in assisting me. He provided before and after pictures and a walk through video explaining everything so I could be comfortable with his work. I can't physically be there, so he was my eyes and brought unknown issues to my attention, which he verified with pictures. I have a property management company, but their bids were high to do some of this work, which is why I shopped around and found Birmingham Fast Repair.  They also didn't catch some of the issues Chris did. My experience leads me to believe that Chris is nothing short of honest, knowledgeable, trustworthy, and hardworking. Highly recommended.

name: Bryan Ramsey
text: It took about a month for someone to come out to do measurements (started the 2nd week of March). I was told I would be contacted 2 weeks later for an install. I understand this happened at the beginning of the COVID-19 situation and is a hard time for all of us, but I had not received any other communication or follow up from anyone. I had sent text messages on 2 occassions (a month after measurments) and no response. I'm not sure what its like in this line of work, but I was willing to spend close to $3K on the project and not a peep from anyone. This may not seem like a lot of money in this line of work, but $3K for a day or two of work I would be running to complete this job. I'm  concerned about the lack of follow-thru in communication. There are plenty of people that need work and it's disappointing to see the lack of interest.

resp.text: Bryan, I appreciate the feedback. Obviously we missed the mark on this one and I sincerely apologize. I’ll certainly look into what went wrong and make the necessary adjustments to prevent this from happening again!

name: Grace Willis
text:
Couldn't recommend anyone better! (Ask for Ethan!)

I called Birmingham Fast Repair to book a quote and possible appointment to install a pedicure chair's foot rest at my job. They were very fast and informative to book someone for us. They sent an email with a name/photo/bio/contact of who the handyman would be. He followed up the day before and day of (before the appointment).

Upon arrival he was prepared and friendly. He assessed the parts/chair and confidently installed everything exactly as needed and at a timely manner -- I commend him for agreeing to fix it, especially since he had never worked on a pedi chair (who even has?) and it's fairly complex considering there are water lines and pipes involved. He communicated everything very well.

Thank you for everything. We will definitely be recommending you all to everyone we can!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words! It means so much!

name: Rebecca Barganier
text: Excellent experience. 10/10, would recommend, will use again!

name: Shavon Gaines
text:
I called around to several appliance place to see if I could get my freezer looked at and the first three places I called got no answer, went online to schedule an appointment and no one got back with no and finally I contacted A Able they picked up the phone, they came on time and fixed the problem and was reasonably priced. I will definitely use them again.

Carl the technician was awesome and finished the job  really quick. Love his spirit.

name: Fan Gugel
text: From the initial call through the day of service, my expectations were exceeded.  The appointment was for two business days after the initial call, Carl showed up on time and even checked in with me by phone twice before arriving.  He was familiar with the model of refrigerator and quickly determined that it was most common problem for the model.  It was running perfectly within 20 minutes of arrival.  Based on my experience, I recommend him to anyone who is polite and appreciates honest people who work professionally.

name: Cara Kriegshauser
text: Mr. Williams had my washing machine back up and running in no time.  The price was exactly what I expected and very reasonable.  Will definitely recommend him to family and friends.

name: D J
text: Washer was giving draining error. Drained and tried again samething. Call A Able Appliance and they came out next day. Changed a pump motor part out, washer seemed to ran fine. After Carl left ran a load and error popped up again and wash didn't drain was making a clicked sound. Had video of sound and  error message. Called Carl who had just left and told him he said he would come back the next day. Showed video. Ran a cycle but, of course did not act up. Possible the circuit board he said. Which is something they don't deal with anymore. In fairness another repair company did not work on Samsung washers possibly due to samething. Would use A Able again.

name: Adam Speck
text: Called Able Repair on Wednesday and my Samsung dryer was back up running by Friday at noon.  Excellent service and fair price.  I would recommend them to anyone looking for an appliance repair shop.

name: Caitlyn Weston
text: Carl fit me into his schedule just a couple hours after I called to make an appointment, he showed up on time and called to let me know he was on his way. He immediately diagnosed the problem with my dryer and had it repaired and put back together in a half hour! I can’t recommend him more highly, he was professional, fair priced, knowledgeable, and I’ll call him next time I need anything repaired!

name: Cynthia S
text: Wasted time with this company. I had already informed the company of the model number for my washer and dryer the day before. The next day, as soon as the man saw my dryer he refused to work on it. He said he didn't work on Frigidaire. I said it's Kenmore and that I had already given info to the company BEFOREHAND to make sure they could do the job (yes and they had the part in stock). He said Frigidaire and Kenmore are the same exact thing except for a sticker. I told him I had been waiting all day and will you really not do the work? No. No apology, just no. BONUS 1-STAR: When he came to the door I held up my mask and asked if he had one. He shook his head no and came on in so...if you're concerned about COVID...

name: DaVonna Wheeler
text: I needed someone to fix my dryer, so I had to google, this was the first place that popped up for me. When I talked to the owner he was very professional. He called to let me know he was on the way, he pulled up and it took him 30 minutes all together. He was very kind and very pleasant to talk to and seemed very knowledgeable. I'd recommend him to anyone.

name: Lindsay Grissom
text: We called this right away monday morning when our dryer went out over the weekend. He got us in the same day and arrived on time! Carl fixed the issue and already had the needed parts! We had an awesome experience and I would recommend them for your appliance needs. Professional and quick service!

name: Olive Muriithi
text:
I highly recommend A Able Appliance. I appreciate the level of communication that I received from the polite receptionist on the phone that made my next day appointment .I'm thankful I did not have to wait a week or more to get service. I also appreciate Mr Carl professionalism as well as his ability to be thorough and honest. He was able to finish doing the repair on a timely manner.
Thankyou
again God Bless.

name: Bobbie Sawada
text: Carl showed up when he said he would,  examined the refrigerator and freezer and we to let the freezer thaw to find the problem. I would trust his experience and knowledge about appliances over anyone. Very friendly and professional...

text: Carl was able to fix my washing machine in about 10minutes! It is an older machine so I was worried I would have to replace it. I called him at 8am, he was at my house by 11am and it was fixed by 11:10. Amazing work! Great service! I Highly recommend!!

name: Danielle Young
text:
If I could give them zero I would....

I made an appointment the prior week for an appointment Monday. The lady took down all of my information. My number, problem, and address. Monday rolls around and I get a phone call saying “he can’t come” because they don‘t service the area I live in and haven’t for years because of too many “problems” and there is just too much “meanness” going on right now.

He said it’s not safe for him to come to this side of town at this day in age with him being 66 years old because it’s so much meanness going on.  And it had nothing to do with “people of color” although it has everything to do with color. All to get a dryer fixed

So basically we should discriminate against areas of the town where black citizens reside because of the location and not provide good service to them because of “problems and meanness” that is stereotyping and it’s not ok!

I work and pay bills just like any other citizen in any other  of town! All I want is my dryer fixed so I can take care of laundry for my household of six! Two adults and four kids!
Don’t do business here!!!!

name: Dan Gallagher
text: We have used A Able Appliance for over 10 years now.  Carl Williams has been out to our house on every occasion, and he is fantastic.  Knowledgeable, fair, and does not try to rip you off.  I would recommend to others.

I give A Able Appliance five stars for availability, know-how, and good customer service. Carl had to break the news to me that my washer was not worth repairing. He was very kind, honest, and knowledgeable, and he pointed me to the most affordable quality new machine to purchase.
I had called around a bit when looking for a repairman, and two other places said they were booking 5-7 days out. Carl was available to come the next day.

name: Lindsay Sowell
text: We called to have our washing machine repaired. Carl was prompt and efficient. I called Wednesday afternoon and spoke with Carl who told me he'd come the next morning. He called the next morning and came exactly when he said he would. He got right to work on our washing machine, diagnosed the problem, and told me exactly what it would take to fix. He was honest and straight forward and told me that if it were his washing machine, he'd get a new one as we were about to have to sink a lot of money into fixing our current one since he could also tell that while our current problem was a broken seal, our pump was also about to go out and we'd have to call him for another expensive repair in a matter of weeks or months.. Carl's honesty saved us money on repairing a declining washer. We will definitely call A Able appliance again for our repairs! Carl is knowledgeable, efficient, timely, and honest, and that's hard to come by these days. Thank you Carl!

text: I have called A Able Appliance multiple times over the years for service on three different appliances. Each time, they have been very prompt to make an appointment with me and Carl has always shown up when he said he would. He is polite and professional and very knowledgeable, but the most important thing to me is that he is honest. I find it hard to trust repair companies as I have had them tell me things needed repaired that did not; this  is never a concern with this company. Carl is very straight forward and honest – if it needs / can be repaired he will tell you, but if it is more economical for you to just replace it, he will tell you that too. If you are looking for a company you can trust to do right by you and knows their stuff then look no further.

text: We have used Mr. Williams from A Able Appliance on several occasions for different repairs and he is the best in Huntsville.  He is professional, fast and efficient!  We have never had to call him back for a repair he has made.  Thanks for your great service!

name: Jim Ferrell
text: I am extremely dissatisfied with this company. I have used them before, but didn't know they were like this. I had a dryer issue that wasn't heating. He came and said it was the heater coil had gone bad and it was going to be expensive. $276, which at first, didn't seem like a lot considering the whole dryer was a $1000 unit.  So he had the part in his van, goes and gets it, puts it in in under 10 minutes, then hands me the bill, and I pay it.  No biggie, but then I look at the bill, and he's charged me $147 for the part which I found online for $75, and then $115 labor for the whole 25 minutes he was here?!! Seriously? These people claim to be Christians, but doing people like this is not Christian. Doubling the cost of the part, and then $115 labor for what took him not even 10 minutes?  No thanks. Next time, I will just do it myself.

text: They called me on when I was on my way to work to inform me they were on the way to check my washer.  I told them I could not meet them and would appreciate a prior notice. I called the manufacturer again and two days later a tech called and said he would call back and let me know when he was on the way but it would be the day of the service.  I told him I worked for a living and could not take off without a notice at least the day before.  He said they could not do that and did not schedule prior to the day of service.  He informed me that they always did business this way.  I asked if I was the only person they had ever dealt with that had a problem with the system and he said I was.  Go figure.  I suppose I am supposed to sit for a week or so at my house hoping for a phone call??????

name: Lauren White
text:
I really don't like leaving bad reviews, but I would give Mr. Appliance 0 stars if it was an option. The staff at Mr. Appliance are very nice and I'm sure they are good people, but they are extremely unprofessional. We have worked all summer to get my ice maker repaired, and they still have not delivered on their end. They would either schedule appointments and never show up, or they would show up unnannounced. By the time they replaced my ice maker, they installed it incorrectly and acted like there was nothing they could do about it. The last thing they told me was that they would replace the ice maker again free of charge. I still haven't heard back from them, about the replacement and now they are saying something completely different. Do not use Mr. Appliance!

Edit: they did finally schedule another appointment with me, but they were unable to repair my ice maker because they don’t understand the issue. I’m still having the same problem with the it getting stuck in the “off” position and not ejecting ice on its own. Overall this has been a nightmare to deal with.

resp.text: Lauren:  I understand your frustration.  You were faced with a near obsolete ice maker and water valve, factory closings and shipping delays because of the pandemic, and a technician who had to quarantine for two weeks in the middle of your repair time.  As it turns out when your property manager met us to install that final ice maker there was actually no problem, you only needed to drop the shut off arm which was in the "off" position. I am happy this is finally settled for you.

name: Chris Tarantino
text: Never picked up the phone or returned messages.

resp.text: Mr. Tarantino - I'm sorry for your experience.  However, I can not find a message or missed call with your name.  Please call us again, 334-350-5300 and we will be glad to help.  Thank you.

name: Richard Lawler
text: Parts they replaced did not work,  they refunded my money.

name: David Pettway
text: Oh yes they have your part friendly service

name: Chris Mortensen
text: Had three separate appointments, two they were late and one they didn’t show at all. They said they ordered parts for us and that was the last we heard from them. I called and left messages with no return calls, better off using YouTube videos than hiring these clowns.

resp.text: Mr. Mortesen:  First of all, I apologize for the tardiness of our technician.  We have a new technician now.  Thank you for your patience.  Parts, like so many things now, are severely delayed because of factory closing and shipping during the pandemic. I'm sorry you were not kept in the loop. We will certainly do better.  I'd like to offer you a free diagnostic for your next appliance need. Just let us know when.  Thank you.

name: Dominque Torres
text: I needed to repair my microwave and the technician came out as scheduled.  I received a text with his photo prior to his arrival for safety purposes.  He was wearing a mask and was very personable and professional.  He provided an expert assessment of the problem and was ordered the part all within a short amount of time.  He then returned when he part was in, again as scheduled and completed the repair in a short amount of time.  He did an amazing job and I would definitely recommend Mr. Appliance for your appliance repairs!  Sincerely, Dominque

resp.text: Thank you Dominique!  Let us know if we can help again.

text: When speaking with their office, we agreed upon an 1115 to 1 o’clock arrival time. I received a text stating that in writing. The day he was due to come by, the repair man called me at 10 o’clock telling me he was at my house. I told him that our agreed-upon time was at 11:15 until one and that I was at work and could not just leave. I asked him if he could come back at the arranged time, and he said no and that it was not his problem. When I call their office, the receptionist was rude and told me she would just cancel altogether when I tried to report what the repair man told me. I have never dealt with any one so rude, unprofessional, and inappropriate as this business! I will never use them again, and I warn you that neither should you.

name: JoAnn Matthews-Brown
text:
My experience from the technician Joshua and Janet the manager was horrible at the Montogomery location. I would like a call from the general manager for the brand. The technician completed a service without asking if we wanted the service.  His response was “I’m gong ho and when I see something that needs to be done I just do it.”  I asked the break down cost of the final service and he said that wasn’t possible, I would get an email. Then he proceeded in a angry and aggressive way and he told me, I’ll just take the belt off.  I then heard lots of banging as I proceeded to call the manager at the location out of concern. When I called the manager to ask if this was it was normal process to not give the customer a breakdown of cost prior to payment she indicated that is was normal. When ask informed her of the technician’s behavior she explained it away, attempted to talk over me and discard my concerns. She told me I didn’t get the “full” diagnostic experience because I knew what was wrong with my dryer. Does that equate to  company goal to seek opportunities to upcharge the customer. Horrible service. I do not recommend this company. I do not trust the work and based on the behavior am not confident that anything was actually done. I don’t see the worn roller that was removed???
In addition he stated the back panel of a three year of  dryer was bend when was the reason for the worn roller. I visually didn’t see the bend. He indicated the cost for the part along $165 without taxes and not including install. I told him. That’s a “no!”  It seems the company is more interested in making money and less interested in providing great service customers.
BTW - they got my address wrong twice in the confirmation email. The day of the appt. I had to call back twice to spell it out. Quality is priority in my work and I expect the same for services I pay for.

resp.text: I'm sorry your experience with out company did not work out as planned.  Hope things are better with your dryer.

text: Their technician does the high end appliances!! I have a Miele fridge and Josh the tech was able to work on it with no problems. Bethany, the lady who booked my appointment was so sweet! The office kept me updated and made sure to let me know the status of my part. It took about 2 and a half weeks to get it in, but my fridge is over 10 years old so that was to be expected for Miele parts. For only an 89 dollar diagnostic fee, these people are winners! They also offer one year of warranty on the parts and labor, so when my fridge broke a second time, they came out at no cost to us. name: RACHAEL
text:
I was supposed to have my refrigerator fixed today “ 03/23/2021.. My ice maker and water dispenser does not work... The 1st time the gentleman showed up on time to verify the temperature, model and what needed to be fixed and ordered.  I was okay with that the date was a week ago.  I called Service Care today because at this time I had not received confirmation to verify the time he was coming... There was no confirmation like email, text or no one had called to confirm.  I call the company today and Ms Chen states the parts “may” be in on the 25th of March and I explained to her that this was not explained to me she states the technician does not know when the items comes in I explained to her I don’t know his job of what information should or should not have been relayed to me I just know the date I was told the parts would be in and the date he will be back to fix it.
Of course, I requested to speak to the manager and of course the “MANAGER” is not here but I will relay the message!!!!

Please do not give a date you will fix appliances  if it can’t be done.....

IN THE FUTURE AT LEAST CALL THE CUSTOMER TO LET THEM KNOW THERE IS A DELAY OF DELIVERY OF ITEMS NEEDED SO THE CUSTOMER DOES NOT HAVE TO WAIT!!!!! STILL WAITING, NOT PLEASED AT ALL ... UNSATISFIED CUSTOMER!!!!!

I would not give this one star!!!!!

UPDATE ***03/26/2021**

I’m changing this from “1” STAR TO “4” STARS
The technician and a manager came to my home and apologized for the miscommunication... The part unfortunately would not fix my refrigerator “Ice maker and Water dispenser” because there is a shortage in the wiring and now I need a new refrigerator.  The technician was very professional, detailed in his explanation of why it did not work.  I will use SERVICE CARE again because even thou there was a “ball” dropped in the beginning they did follow up immediately and did not blame everyone else they took OWNERSHIP and that is what we are missing in these days and time....You made a uphappy customer a HAPPY CUSTOMER...

Thank you

resp.text: (Part not available from manufacturer, last one found in the counry, part arrived today, scheduled for today). I apologize, the part required to fix your water dispenser is no longer available from the manufacturer, however we have diligently pursued finding this part through other sources and found the last one available online. I'm sorry about the lack of communication regarding the difficulty of finding this part. We really expected this brand to support their products better with parts availibility. Tracking number 1Z3V582E0318781474 shows that your part was received at 11:42am, and we have confirmed the part is here and good, and our tech will be coming to you in 30 minutes or less!

name: Taliesha Cash
text: I really tried to give this company the benefit of the doubt but after the 4th visit to my house and no resolve  I'm done ..out of $350 and nothing works  my ice maker quit and it was working fine before they started trying to work on my freezer leak ..the freezer is still not closing after the drawer rod and hinges were replaced so that the door would close. it was closing fine and freezing before they touched it...At this point I count it all a lost and I guess I need a new refrigerator sure wish I could have used that $350 on a new one instead of wasting it on all these wasted visits to my house..save your coins and don't call them...

resp.text:
In order to make up for a bad experience, we have offered this customer a free deluxe home appliance maintenance service call, which includes safety and preventative issue maintenance on their refrigerator, washer, dryer, dryer vent, dishwasher and oven (a $299 value).

This review was written before we refunded this customer. Sometimes a unit is too old, and has too many problems, to justify repair. We issued a refund after the customer decided to buy a new unit rather than approve further repairs. -- Initially we traced her leak to a clogged condensate drain, but she continued to have the leak. After the drain was found clogged again and cleared, it continued to leak. Further investigation found that that her drawer was not closing perfectly because of a defective gear, which was allowing moist room air into the freezer which was building up high levels of frost, which was also causing her drain to clog. When the unit defrosted, it would produce the leak called us about in the first visit. The rails to the drawer were also rusty, which interfered with proper drawer closure. In addition, she had a stuck light switch, which was unrelated to the leak problem.

text: They came back and did a wonderful job fix my washer dryer and fridge   help me out so much great great great you better let them come and help you

She accepted our offer, we performed the maintenance (including a pretty serious blockage in their dryer vent). I really enjoyed meeting both of them, super nice people.

Original Reply: (Unfortunately, this unit had multiple issues including rusted hinges, and that's what made this unit unrepairable. We try to fix every unit we come into contact with, but sometimes there are more issues than are worth repairing. We have refunded this customer completely to try to make this a better experience.)

name: T N
text: I cannot recommend the Service Care team enough. They thoroughly earned their 5 Stars and exceeded every expectation of top notch customer service one could have. Toxey and his team did everything possible to help me find the part I needed, got it to me in a timely manner, and did so at an extremely fair cost. They put up with my 10k questions and let me pick their brain constantly on symptoms and what it might mean rather than selling me a bunch of parts that may or may not work. If you're looking for a team that will help you with your electronics and do so until the job is done, I would recommend you give them a call first. Thank you for all of your help.

resp.text:
Update: I look forward to hearing from you. Ask for Toxey at 205-956-3777. Thank you!

Wow! I’m so sorry, our hours have been changed for years, and I don’t know why the website wasn’t updated. If you’ll contact me Monday at 956-3777 I would like to hear about your experience and give you a credit towards your service for your wasted gas and time. My name is Toxey McDavid, and I am the owner. - update, I found a part sales page with Saturday hours listed. I’ve contacted our web developer and asked them to hunt these down and fix them. I hope that you’ll contact me and allow me to make this up to you. - Toxey

name: Lee Sharp
text: After waiting a week and a half for the repairman to come fix our LG refrigerator cooling issue, he came, claimed that our compressor needed replacing, and left. A week later, he came back to replace the compressor and fix the icemaker. He did and said it would cool in 24 hours. It did, so we put our food back in the refrigerator. THE NEXT MORNING, it was out again. All of our food was ruined. We had to call the actual LG repairman (which there is only ONE in the city of Birmingham). When he came, he had to AGAIN replace the compressor because the job before was so poor. He also had to replace another evaporator line because it was not working. The icemaker STILL does not work. This is STILL one of the worst experiences. After a month and a half, we finally have a cooling refrigerator, but still no icemaker.

resp.text: Lee, I'm the owner of Service Care and I apologize for your service experience. LG has more than one authorized service company, and I can assure you that we are one of them. I'm just unhappy that you're unhappy, and I would love to hear from you about your experience and do what I can to make it right for you. My company phone number is 205-956-3777, my name is Toxey McDavid, and I truly want to try to make this right.

text: We tried inserting a new filter in our Whirlpool Refrigerator, and something happened that prevented any water flowing through. resp.text: This review does not make any sense. -- We were paid by her extended warranty to provide service, and her extended warranty would not just abandon her to have to buy a new unit. This customer called to tell us it still had an issue after our repair (no mention of supposed damages at this time), we told her we would be happy to fix it, but she would have to call her extended warranty to send another dispatch. We never heard from them. -- Now we receive a review that implies we ruined her refrigerator and now has to buy a new one? -- This isn't how extended warranties work. We're very confused by this review, as we in no way damaged her refrigerator. We installed two parts, an icemaker and a damper... there's no way we could have damaged her unit, and no way her extended warranty would have told her she had to pay for a new unit (that's not how extended warranties work).

text: I was overall pleased with the repairs. I think that your staff could have kept me more informed and up to date on the progress. I had to call twice to check to see if it was ready. resp.text:
I checked into this repair to see how we failed to call and let you know it was ready for six days, and what I found was that the part came in on 10/20/2016, was scheduled for tech to install part on 10/24/2016, the tech called that day when it was finished, and it was picked up on the next day. The time between completion and customer contact was less than an hour.

I can't see where we failed to provide follow up on this repair, and I'm sorry that we somehow created that perception.

resp.text: Hello, it sounds like the unit was not drying, and what was needed to repair that issue was a thorough dryer vent cleaning. If you compare prices with other companies that offer dryer vent cleaning, you will find that we are comparable or better in our pricing. We consider this a repair, as the unit was not functioning before we arrived, and after we spent time working on your issue the dryer was working again. I would love to discuss this with you further, please feel free to call our office at 956-3777 and ask for Toxey. I am very interested in hearing from you about what we could do to make this 5 star service. Thank you!

text:
Craig was a pleasure to have in our home.

Polite, professional, and pretty cool to deal with the unexpected situation that he walked into (squirrels in kitchen hood exhaust) with such a pleasant demeanor.

Highly recommended.

name: Scott Blanchard
text: When our Bosch in-wall microwave went on the blink, I contracted service care to do a fault diagnosis so that I could order the faulty part(s) and repair it. The technician misdiagnosed the problem as a blown fuse. Once I purchased a new fuse and replaced it (an extremely easy process), upon turning on the microwave the fuse immediately blew again. So, I was out my $85 diagnostic fee and still did not know the real issue. My first attempts to get Service Care to complete the diagnosis were unsuccessful, however, after some time, the service care owner called me and we reached a satisfactory agreement. For this reason, I would use Service Care again and can recommend them to others.

resp.text: Thank you Scott for your feedback about this experience, and for allowing us the chance to make it right. We appreciate you, and look forward to helping you in the future.

name: Ron Berry
text: Was professional and on time.  The tech knew exactly what to troubleshoot based on description of the problem.  I will use again.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Ron! We're glad you were satisfied with your service.

name: Your name Your name
text: My LG refrigerator compressor went out. This is one of the companies LG forces you to use. Even with LG covering the expense of the compressor, about 350.00 the quote was 800.00 for then to spend 2-3 hours to repair.  The worst part was the tech told me it was a 50/50 chance it would last. The reason behind the ridiculous price, the tech explained that there was a strong possibility that multiple service calls would be made in the first year and they dont get paid for those, meaning the price hike was to help cover their possible future expense  The going rate from several other companies not affiliated with LG was approximately 400.00 to swap out the compressor, vacume to 5 microns and refill with r134.  Today, I am having another company come to my home and swapping the compressor to the non linear compressor, all paid out of my pocket, the entire job cost me 595.00. So how can it possibly be so much for the LG compressor swap if LG is covering the cost due to warranty? Another noteworthy mentioning is that I told the tech I would mount the compressor myself and would sweat on the copper connections myself, but that wouldn't change the price according to the tech. It's called price gouging and its pathetic. Be very cautious when dealing with this company, there are much better options out there, thankfully I found one, thanks Appliance Service LLC. A small locally owned business with an awesome response time (next day) and an affordable price. He also guarantees his work for a year, same as this one. No, I was not asked to mention his business, but who could resist when these other money bandits are out there preying on the unsuspecting.

resp.text: I appreciate you taking time to talk with me over the phone today about your issues. Your feedback is appreciated and helps us improve the customer experience. I understand where you are coming from, but we are an authorized warranty service provider for LG and we are not allowed to replace any part with a non-standard, experimental part. LG has an extensive process that they require in these repairs, in order to make the replacement compressors they provide function correctly in their units. These requirements add to the ordinary time it takes to repair these refrigerators, that may not be required when using parts that were not made for this unit. Unfortunately, as a warranty provider, our contract prohibits us from using non-standard parts to repair your refrigerator. If you will send us a proof of repair from the other servicer, including the parts used to repair the unit, I would appreciate it. I offered to refund your diagnostic, but did not realize that we did not collect it since we were unable to provide you with the service you desired.

name: Shaunda Kidd
text: Mr. Morgan was on time, and did a great job. Really appreciated his professionalism.

resp.text: Thank you! We're very proud of him, and glad to have him as part of Service Care's family. Happy to service Center Point and take care of your Whirlpool refrigerator.

name: KEVIN FOSHEE
text: Last summer when I had my dryer serviced I thought it was a little expensive, but they did a good job. Well it broke again... But to my disbelief, they honored the 1 year warranty and had the dryer fixed same day at no cost!

resp.text: Thank you! We offer a one year warranty on the services performed to show that we really, really, really stand behind our repairs. And we do! I'm glad we could take care of your Samsung Dryer and hope you don't have any more problems with it.

name: Bucky Wood
text: Very efficient and timely. Expert repair. I will use Service Care and Shay again!

resp.text: We're happy to hear about your positive experience with us, Bucky. Thank you for your review and your business!

name: Mark Rupright
text:
The power circuit of our five-year old LCD TV blew out and I called Service Care. Barry Beasley came out the next day and verified that it was the power circuit, found a capacitor that had blown, replaced it on the spot, and determined that the damage was more extensive. When he looked up the price of the replacement part, we decided it was more convenient to buy a new TV. He didn't even charge us for the attempt to fix the problem, only the service call!

Barry was very friendly, helpful, and professional. I plan to call on Service Care for other repairs in the future.

name: Catherine Cowden
text: I've known this family for years. My father was a technician with them years ago. Not only was it a wonderful place for him to work and support his family, when it came time for our family to be customers of this company, we were treated like members of their family.

resp.text: The Cowdens will always, always be family. Your dad is a lot of fun, has a good heart, and is one of the coolest guys I've ever known. It's a pleasure providing you with service.

name: Scents From Heaven
text: I am very pleased with the service ServiceCare provided. They were able to repair my washer in a timely manner and were very professional and courteous. I'm really glad I chose them for my repair needs.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words, I'm glad that our service met (and hopefully exceeded) your expectations. It was our pleasure to help you with your washing machine repair!

name: Cindy Cuellar
text: I contacted Service Care in morning and they told me that one of their technicians would be contacting me soon.  The technician, Scott, contacted me 30 minutes later to let me know that he was on his way. Scott and another technician arrived and they were very pleasant and assured me that they would get to the root of the problem with my dryer not heating. Scott checked the fuses, heating element, thermal cutoff, etc. on my dryer and all were working. He determined that the dryer was not heating because the control board on the dryer needed to be replaced. He also recommended that I purchase a new dryer because my dryer was old and it would be much more expensive to replace the control  board and install it. I suspected this might be the end result, but I felt it was best to have the experts make that determination. Despite the fact that I have to purchase another dryer, I was very pleased with the promptness, knowledge and professionalism of Scott and the other technician that came with him, and because of this experience, I will be contacting Service Care in the future if I ever need service on my appliances or television sets. I highly recommend them.

resp.text: We're very proud of the care our technicians show when they come to your home. Scott and Greg are two genuinely good people, that live up to the "Care" in our company name. Proud to have them represent us!

name: teresa spencer
text: Cliff was very friendly and knowledgeable about his job. He’s the best.

resp.text: We're very proud to have Cliff serving all the neighborhoods in 35217, and so glad we could take care of your refrigerator the same day!

name: Patricia Noffsinger
text:
Requested a dryer repair from this service and was very pleased with the overall professionalism and customer service. When the technician came to evaluate my abnormally noisy dryer I was quoted and shown an invoice for parts/labor totaling over $560. I reluctantly chose to have my dryer repaired because buying a new dryer would cost several hundred more dollars. I was also required to pay half of the service fee before Service Care would come out to complete the repair—I assumed so that the very expensive parts could be ordered. When *my technician arrived I was surprised to see him carrying a very small bag of parts and was finished with the repair in less than 30 mins—I was expecting a little bit more for a repair costing well over $500 dollars. Come to find out when I researched the actual cost of parts I found out the parts cost around $35 which means service care charged me nearly 1000k an hr for labor. Please do not use this company. A total scam. Buy the parts yourself, watch a  tutorial YouTube video, and save yourself literally HUNDREDS of dollars.

Heard back from customer service. Per their customer service rep my technician mistakenly charged me for the parts 4 times resulting in a quote that was over $200 dollars more than what it should have been. The invoice I received from the tech clearly states that only one was ordered for a parts/installation fee of $560.11 which alerted my spider sense. Customer service offered me an ultimatum of either $200+ refund because of tech’s alleged mistake (meaning I still paid over $300 dollars to replace a $35 dollar part that took 30 mins to replace) or they would come out to take out the $35 part for a full refund. Despite having been charged a fee of $80+ for an in-home quote which by their own admission was inaccurate they refused to refund that. I only agreed to the repair because based on the description of what needed to be done to repair the unit seemed extensive and beyond my skill set. If I didn’t have to take another day off wrk (on top of the 2 I already had to for the quote and the repair) for them to come out to take back what they put in I would have gladly had them come out and take it out. Found a step by step tutorial video on YouTube and the repair is actually quite simple.

Service Care this type of business practice is shameful to charge such ridiculous amounts of money for simple repairs. This is flat out fraudulent and predatory. Their excuse for such high pricing basically boils down to “We use nationally recognized software to provide quotes...” Translation: We do it because we CAN. Not because it’s RIGHT. They knowingly charge SEVERAL hundred dollars an hr for labor for relatively simple repairs. Buyer beware and be sure to do your research first. This repair could have been easily DIY and done for $35 bucks in parts and a Phillips head screwdriver.

The owner himself discourages buying parts off Amazon in his response but the Service Care website  actually contains a link that customers can use to buy “cheap” OEM replacement parts...from Amazon. :l
Again, a total scam, folks. Stay clear of this place.  Had I not questioned my order I would have been duped.  This is supposed to be a repair that the company does “hundreds” of times but no one from company realized I was over charged by several hundred dollars (not a few dollars but several HUNDRED dollars) until I said something about it. Had I went to Publix to buy a gallon of milk and it rang up for $50, the cashier would have instantly thought, “Huh...it’s usually $3.99. Something must be wrong.” Not Service Care. They will take your money and run without thinking twice about it. They still refuse to refund my in-home quote fee for a quote that was inaccurate.

*Technician’s name removed from review at the request of the owner

resp.text: Hi, I'm sorry you were so unhappy with your experience, and I can see why. The technician made a technical error while building your quote. Instead of quoting for a pack of 4 rollers, he quoted for four 4-packs of rollers. The pricing software that we use thought we were replacing those parts 4 times, which increased the quote. (We would be happy to send you a copy of the original quote, which included the 4 rollers, not one). I feel certain that we would have caught that during our billing process, but we appreciate you calling us so soon after your repair to let us know. We're issuing you a refund for the difference. We stand behind our repairs with a one-year warranty which requires us to use OEM manufacturer parts which are usually more expensive than the cheap ones you find on Amazon. Of course, most of the cost of any repair, from any company, is the labor and skill that it takes to diagnose the problem correctly and replace it in a timely manner. I appreciate the feedback! Good and bad helps us to continuously grow and improve as a company. Listening to our customers has been a huge reason we have been a family and locally owned business for well over 30 years.

name: Anthony Marino
text: Ask questions about ladder work but still charge for service call

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. We apologize that you were not completely satisfied with your service. However, we base all of our prices off the Major Appliance Service National Price Guide. By using this guide, we ensure that our customers are getting the best possible repair price for their dollar, considering all the factors that go into providing excellent service.

name: Cindy Cuellar
text: I contacted Service Care in morning and they told me that one of their technicians would be contacting me soon.  The technician, Scott, contacted me 30 minutes later to let me know that he was on his way. Scott and another technician arrived and they were very pleasant and assured me that they would get to the root of the problem with my dryer not heating. Scott checked the fuses, heating element, thermal cutoff, etc. on my dryer and all were working. He determined that the dryer was not heating because the control board on the dryer needed to be replaced. He also recommended that I purchase a new dryer because my dryer was old and it would be much more expensive to replace the control  board and install it. I suspected this might be the end result, but I felt it was best to have the experts make that determination. Despite the fact that I have to purchase another dryer, I was very pleased with the promptness, knowledge and professionalism of Scott and the other technician that came with him, and because of this experience, I will be contacting Service Care in the future if I ever need service on my appliances or television sets. I highly recommend them.

resp.text: We're very proud of the care our technicians show when they come to your home. Scott and Greg are two genuinely good people, that live up to the "Care" in our company name. Proud to have them represent us!

name: Rhonda Cole
text: Brian is always very courteous and proficient. Katy, in the office, is on top of things.

resp.text: Thank you for the great feedback on Brain and Katie, they are excellent employees! We appreciate your business, Rhonda.

name: Lindsay Hewitt
text: They were not able to fix the problem I was having with my stove due to the parts being discontinued, which was fine by itself. I had six burners that were clicking nonstop but the problem was only with two.  The tech that came out was able to make them stop clicking and told me I would just have to use the other four burners but then he undid fixing the burners before he left so I had to fix it myself after he left.

resp.text: *Parts no longer available* -- Thank you for the feedback. I can understand your disappointment that the parts that were no longer available for your repair. I spoke with our technician, and he did not mean to "unfix" your burners. When he demonstrated to your husband that they were working, he tells me he honestly thought that they were functioning properly. I'm glad you are able to use the four remaining burners, and I'm terribly sorry that the parts were not available.

name: Mark Rupright
text:
The power circuit of our five-year old LCD TV blew out and I called Service Care. Barry Beasley came out the next day and verified that it was the power circuit, found a capacitor that had blown, replaced it on the spot, and determined that the damage was more extensive. When he looked up the price of the replacement part, we decided it was more convenient to buy a new TV. He didn't even charge us for the attempt to fix the problem, only the service call!

Barry was very friendly, helpful, and professional. I plan to call on Service Care for other repairs in the future.

name: David Ball
text:
The technician that came out and serviced my dryer was great.  He figured out what the problem was and fixed it withouit any issues.

I plan to use them again for some other appliance repairs that I have coming up

resp.text: That's awesome, we're glad to help with your Maytag Dryer. We proudly provide service to our Heatherwood neighbors in Hoover.

name: Kiwi Superbo
text: Curtis was a sharp,professional and personable service technician. I watched him work on multiple appliances with excellent attention to detail.He was relentless in scoping out and fixing the problem. I trust him to work on any of our future needs.

name: Nancy Borkowski
text: Scott was on time and very professional. I will definitely use Service Care again!

resp.text: We appreciate your business, Nancy. Thank you for leaving us a review.

name: Timika Kelly

resp.text: Thank you for the great review, Timika! Please let us know if you need anything in the future.

name: Madison Murphy
text: I have used Service Care several times and have been very pleased with their service. The people are very kind and they are experienced with the upper end appliances and how to fix them.

name: Sara Walter
text: We have nothing but good things to say about Craig Raney.  He is always prompt and professional.  We wish all service people would be so personable, friendly and helpful.

resp.text: We're very proud to have Craig Raney as a technician. Thank you!

name: Lynn Holder
text: The service technician Cliff was very nice and professional. He installed a part on my washer and took time to make sure that I understood everything.

resp.text: Thank you for leaving a review, Lynn. We're glad Cliff was able to fix your washer.

name: Kim Brittle
text: Disappointing experience.  I called for a washer and dishwasher repair.  They could not get a technician out for over a week.  I called another local service who could have someone out the next day.  Once I knew the repair needed (motor replacement), I called them back to ask an approximate price if they indeed diagnosed the same repair when they came.  Russ, who answered the phone, was rude and dismissive.  When I asked my question he said "I don't even work on them so I have no idea on that" rather than trying to refer me to someone who would?  After his response I said well I guess I need to cancel the service call I requested and after asking my number said "yep - you're cancelled".  He did not try to earn my business and made it clear he had plenty of customers and no time for one that dared to ask a question.  Unfortunate, but not someone I would trust with a $400-500 repair, if they are unwilling to answer my question or even try to earn my business.

resp.text: Hi Kim, It's our policy to not provide estimates over the phone, whether it's based on the diagnosis of another company or not. I really feel that our customer service representative could have done a much, much better job communicating with you and helping you to understand why we don't do this, and I apologize for the experience you had.

name: Gail Hide
text: Excellent service!! Will definitely use again and recommend! Scott was very professional and knowledgable!

resp.text: Thank you! We're proud of Scott and glad we gave you 5 star service.

name: Mike Natter
text: Doug did a great job in servicing the cook top

resp.text: Thank you! We're proud of Doug, and his massive experience with cooking products. We love Hoover customers and we take great pride in taking care of your Jenn-Air cooktop.

name: Patricia K Martin
text:
The tech called before he came and was excellent. Barry was polite, amiable, and extremely knowledgable .
Resolved the issue quickly and explained the process.

name: Joe Stephens
text:
Tech provided an inflated quote including a part that was not broken.  Also told me it would be at least a week before they could get the parts.

That night, I followed the troubleshooting steps in the manual, and was quickly able to identify the broken part.  He would have also if he'd bothered to use a voltage meter.  Bought the part locally the next day and completed the repair.

Looking back, it was clear he just wanted to collect the service fee and leave.  Would not recommend!

resp.text: ** Cannot find this customer in our system ** --- Although I am terribly sorry you had a bad service experience, I can not find a service call with your first and last name within the past 5 years. --- I've also looked for any calls with your last name in the last 6 months and none of them matched what you described. --- If you received bad service from one of my technicians, I want to know about it and I want to make it right... but I can't find you. Please call 956-3777 and ask for Toxey McDavid (owner) so that I can take care of you. I'm determined to fix this.

name: JULIA BELL
text:
Service Care, Inc. did for me in two visits what my home warranty provider could not do in a month, that was repair my dryer.
A tech by the name of Scott came into my
and immediately diagnosed and remedied
my problem. Scott was professional and knowledgeable.

resp.text: Thank you Julia, glad we could help. We're proud to have Scott in our Service Care family, and glad he does a great job taking care of customers.

name: HENRY LAPIDUS
text: I HAVE ALWAYS BEEN HAPPY WITH SERVICE CARE. THAT'S WHY I CONTINUE TO USE THEM. AND I AM VERY PARTICULAR. KEEP IT UP.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review! We've been more than happy to provide you with Appliance and TV service (since 2006!). We appreciate you!

name: Marvin Brokaw
text: I was very pleased with the knowledge, work and results from ServiceCare. Eddie, the technician, diagnosed the problem with my clothes washer quickly, contacted the manufacturer and had the part ordered before he left. He returned the next day and installed it.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words about Eddie and your experience. We aim for 5 star service, and glad we delivered!

name: Tuan Anh Le
text: Mr  toxey reached out to me and we both had a detailed conversation. I am very appreciative that he did that and for that ive become a loyal customer.....very very good customer service....

resp.text: Hi, I'm Toxey McDavid and I'm the owner of Service Care. Please call me at 205-956-3777 so that we can discuss your repair experience. I looked into your repair and checked on the pricing. Our technician charged almost $30 dollars less than the price quoted in our blue-book pricing guide. (This is the guide used by 1000s of appliance repair technicians to price repairs). I also could not find that part for $9 on Amazon. This is a full heater assembly replacement part that includes the heater element, heater housing, and two replacement thermostats and can not be found on Amazon that cheaply. We never use "knock off" discounted parts, only original manufacturer replacement parts. Most of repair costs are actually for labor and diagnosis, and the total time of that process was a good deal more than 15 minutes by our records. I hope to hear from you soon, I want you to be happy with Service Care. Thank you!

name: John Johnson
text:
Wish I could give less than 1 star.  I was told the repairman would be here between 8 and 12, I called at 12:15 to ask about the status of the tech.  I was told that he would not be coming because I never returned a confirmation call.

When I questioned them about the confirmation call I was told they called on three separate occasions.  I had no messages on my machine and no missed calls from their number.  When I told them that fact, they became argumentative about the calls rather than finding a way to resolve the issue.

I would run as fast and as far away from this company as possible.  If you are using this company because you called Lowe's customer service then I would ask the customer rep for another service company.  If you called this company because you found them on the internet then hang up the phone vector they answer.

resp.text:
We offered this customer a free deluxe home appliance maintenance service call, which includes safety and preventative issue maintenance on their refrigerator, washer, dryer, dryer vent, dishwasher and oven (a $299 value).

I have apologized to this customer for his bad experience, and offered him $85 towards the next appliance or television repair. Whether we had called him and left messages or not, he had an expectation of service on that day and we didn't deliver. We've taken steps so that will never happen again.

name: Danielle Rose Hesley
text: Very thoughtful and knowledgable.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review and your business, Danielle. Let us know if you need anything else.

name: Susan Anderson

I have already referred a friend to Service Care for a stove problem. Good job and Thank you!

text: Horrible service. Overpriced for the work I had done. Technician that worked on my microwave didn't know how to even turn it on and didn't seem to know what he was doing nor did anyone who answered when I called. I will NEVER us them again. -5 stars!

resp.text: Shaye really is a wonderful employee and we're glad you think so too! Thank you for such a great review, Vicki.

name: Samantha Gardner
text: These folks noto only had my part, they removed the old heating element from the casing and put the new one in free of charge. They also entertained my three year old and were super sweet!

resp.text: Thank you! -- It was a great pleasure to meet you and your daughter, and glad that your daughter gave her name to our office "jaguar". :)  We're happy to help!

name: Eric Smith
text:
I had a 65" Plasma TV which all HDMI inputs stopped working. I called and I spoke to Russ. I asked for someone to come out to look. After I told them my location I was told it would be $85 to inspect, but if they did repairs it would be subtracted from the labor cost. My TV was expensive so I was willing to accept the risk that it wouldn't be fixed.  and I gave him the model number. The technician called and we arranged a time and he was there in a reasonable amount of time. He asked what the problem was and I explained again that all HDMI ports were not working. He then went to search for a mainboard replacement for the TV. He couldn't find one.

I'm giving them three stars because there was sufficient information given to them to be able to tell me over the phone that they wouldn't be able to find a replacement part. I explained my frustration to the technician. He said that they mostly deal with appliances and he'd never been unable to replace a main board for a somewhat new Panasonic (< 5 years) and that he wouldn't have time to train the staff to get all pertinent information. To me, that's a training issue.

Polite and responsive people, but they need to do better with the information that they are given. They had the part number and the description of the problem. I could have sent them a picture of the back of the TV since that's all the technician needed to see.

resp.text: *We will apply the diagnostic you paid to a future repair* --- I'm sorry that a TV this new is not being supported by the manufacturer. We were as surprised as you were that these basic parts were not available. We will do our best to screen these in the future. I will happily apply the diagnostic fee you paid to a future service call.

name: Bud Pommer
text: We have rental property in the Birmingham area. We live on the Gulf Coast and can not check on things unless we ride 4 hours each way. Service Care Inc. has been there to fix our Maytag washer and just recently the Maytag Dryer. this last service call my wife was in the hospital for surgery when complications occured that were life threatning. I was able to give all my attention to my wife's needs as once again Service Care handled our appliance problem in Birmingham. My thanks goes out to this company! God Bless!

name: Nadine Brown
text: The technician, Benjamin S. phone me ahead to say he was 20 min away, showed up on time, replaced windshield in an hour at my worksite, and was very thorough with post install information.  I would highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you Nadine for the good review, but we don't install windshields. We're Service Care, a TV and appliance repair company for Alabama customers. I'm glad you received good service though. :)

name: Leslie Ellis
text: Extremely professional in appearance and action. Quickly repaired my freezer and were very courteous!

resp.text: Thank you! It's great to hear from you, and we look forward to helping you again whenever needed.

name: Brooke Beckham
text: Service Care is always available, professional and great with follow up. They have provided service for our washer, dryer and refrigerator.

name: Kelly Duke
text: Service care came out and fixed our washer- knew exactly what was wrong immediately. I was initially unhappy with some interactions that I had with the technician, however it was taken care of immediately by the owner, which I think shows a strong commitment to customer service.

resp.text:
Kelly,

I hope you have received my phone call and email response to this review. I absolutely condemn this sort of behavior, and will be taking actions to correct this. If you could contact me at the office at 956-3777, and ask for Toxey McDavid, I want to know about your experience. This will not happen again, I can assure you. I look forward to hearing from you.

name: jane long
text:
It has been one week since Service Care was contacted to repair my Maytag ref/freezer.  They came the second day, now I am waiting, waiting, waiting.....
Communication is terrible.  Technician said we would hear from their parts department in 3-4 hours.  Phone calls to them not very productive did find out a part was ordered 3 days after the technician was at my house.  Really?  3 days and no one can say when they will be back.

resp.text:
I apologize for the negative experience you had with this technician. He is no longer with Service Care.

We never want you to be treated this poorly, and we will not allow someone who works for us to do it either.

Toxey McDavid
Service Care, Inc.

name: Mike Glass
text: Worked with Bosch to fix our new dishwasher that was delivered damaged.

resp.text: We're glad we could repair your Bosch dishwasher, Mike. Please let us know if you need anything else.

text: It took over two months to have my television fixed and after paying $60.00 all I got was wasted time. I repeatedly called and was put off. My technician didn't want to be bothered talking to me about the progress on my television. I ended up coming to pick up my television 2 1/2 months later and having to ship it somewhere else. It was clear that they weren't at all concerned about customer service.

resp.text:
I've already responded to this before, but Google seems to have lost all my responses:

Mrs. Mobley and I have spoken, and her problem was resolved. I refunded her $60, and we had a great conversation. She's a true professional, and I wish her the best with her business.

name: Scott Scroggins
